title: Jim Legxacy Announces Release Date for Long-Teased Black British Music (2025) Mixtape

html:
The British musician’s first project for XL Recordings lands on July 18

Last year, Jim Legxacy signed to XL Recordings and began teasing a mixtape called Black British Music (2024). The project is now called Black British Music (2025), and it’s officially out on July 18. Take a look at the mixtape cover below.

Black British Music (2025) will include Jim Legxacy’s recent singles “Father” and “Stick.” It will not, however, include the British musician’s debut XL single, “Aggressive.” The mixtape will follow 2023’s Homeless N***a Pop Music.

Black British Music (2025):

01 Context
02 Stick
03 New David Bowie
04 Sun

Matthew Strauss is a Long Island native and a graduate of Columbia University. He joined Pitchfork in 2013. ... Read More
